title: Introduction to Next.js
description: A comprehensive guide to getting started with Next.js, the popular React framework.

title: Understanding Static Site Generation
description: Learn about Static Site Generation (SSG) in Next.js and how it can improve your web app's performance.
author: Bob Smith

title: Dynamic Routing in Next.js
description: This article covers how to implement dynamic routing in Next.js applications using the new App Router.

description: Step-by-step tutorial on how to create a fully-featured blog using Next.js and Markdown.

title: Optimizing Images with Next.js
description: Discover the built-in tools in Next.js for optimizing images and improving site performance.
author: Ethan Martinez
